contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=October 2010}} '''Zephyrhills''' is a brand of [[spring water]] sold regionally in the United States by [[Nestlé]] Waters North America. It is sourced from Crystal Springs, located near [[Crystal Springs, Florida|Crystal Springs]] and [[Zephyrhills, Florida]], as well as other Florida springs. Zephyrhills Spring Water Company was acquired in 1987 by Perrier Group of America, a division of Nestlé.<ref>{{cite journal | last = Samek | first = Kelly | year = 2004 | month = Spring | title = Unknown Quantity: The Bottled Water Industry and Florida's Springs | journal = Journal of Land Use & Environmental Law | volume = 19 | issue = 2 | pages = 582 | publisher = [[Florida State University]] College of Law | location = Tallahassee, Florida | issn = 0892-4480 | url = http://www.law.fsu.edu/journals/landuse/vol19_2/samek.pdf }} </ref> ==References== <references /> ==External links== *[http://www.zephyrhillswater.com/ Official Site] {{Nestlé}} [[Category:Bottled water brands]] [[Category:Products introduced in 1987]] {{food-product-stub}}
